website_summaries.verdict: The remote control is a huge plus here, giving you easy control of the alarms from the outside the house.
pros: Ships with a remote that gives you control of 4 modes: Arm, Disarm, Panic, and Doorbell
Alarm takes 2 AAA batteries (not included) and remote takes a 9-volt battery (included)
cons: The alert that sounds when you're simply changing modes is very loud
Some buyers said this alarm stopped working within a few days

customer_reviews.title: This is what I needed! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought 2 different brands for the style but you can turn them on and off on the outside... this is perfect .. just what I needed! You can only turn off by remote... so I needed it for my front door with a teenager trying to sneak out. Ha ha I win!!
customer_reviews.author: Holliister

customer_reviews.title: Arming is too loud!
customer_reviews.text: Man, this was almost the perfect alarm. BUT because the ARMING is as loud as the actual alarm, I can't use it - just arming (turning it on or off) it will wake everyone one up, alert criminals, scare the neighbors, it's just not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m TOTALLY SATISFIED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write reviews. However, I decided to do so because I’m DEFINITELY pleased with my purchase. I’m a single female who lives in an apartment. For some reason, this complex only has one lock on the front door. In other apartments that I’ve lived in, there’s always been a doorknob lock plus a deadbolt lock. But not here. So, I’ve been a little uneasy, especially at night, since I moved in 3 months ago. Not any more, I sleep like a baby and feel very safe. This alarm was easy to install, will scare away any intruder, and was the right price for my budget. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste T.

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for apartment
customer_reviews.text: Read other reviews that this is loud but did not realize quite how loud. My apartment building has a lot of coming and goings not related to the apartment itself so I got this for a little extra peace of mind. Unfortunately, the beep to just turn on the alarm or doorbell feature is so loud that I find it too bothersome to neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Nymeyer

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe, in a world that is not!
customer_reviews.text: I like be this, I feel safe with it in place. I am a woman who lives alone, if you are a woman you probably know that the world can be a scary place! You’re home should NEVER be one of them! With this alarm in place I know my home is my safe haven! The beeper goes straight on my keys, to arm and unarm the alarm isn’t too loud to bug the down stairs neighbors, but the actual alarm is loud enough to not only scare someone off but alert all my neighbors something is wrong! I love this product and I recommend it to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: The Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. If you are thinking about buying this I highly recommend it. I bought it because living in an apartment I wanted a little extra security. It’s amazing. Super loud and effective. I would recommend buying another remote to have just in case. It is a little hard once mounted to open the battery area to pull the batteries out. I forgot to turn it off and tried to take the batteries out to make it stop with the alarm and couldn’t get it open. Had to run and grab the remote. Overall great product for the price. A+
customer_reviews.author: StephRF

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I got these when my toddler started being able to open doors. I usually just keep them on the chime mode. When my husband is in the field I set it to alarm at night. I bought an extra remote so that I can keep one on my key chain and one next to my bed so that when I wake up in the morning to let the dogs out I can set the alarm back to chime. The chime is loud. I can hear it over the shower easily. It's not a super nice chime sound. That's literally the only thing I can find wrong with this. It sounds like the annoying chime when you walk into some stores.
customer_reviews.author: TalentB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap. Not functioning as described.
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday. Product is horrible. Seems to only beep almost loudly once when connection broken.. This is not what I expected/wanted. It was my understanding that when connection of two parts was broken it would loudly sound an alarm. *as per product claim* I strongly urge anyone considering this to forgo as I had the notion of value due to low price. It seems low price was this products only claim to fame. As is it is at best a door belly with a damn remote that I'd have to a fix to the outside of the door. Total crap. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Alan

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: After putting batteries into the alarm immediately it began to get hot it was so hot that I could not even touch the batteries to get them out. This was very very scary and there is absolutely no customer service to contact in regards to this. I fear that this would’ve happened at a later time and could’ve burned my house down. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal to a fault

customer_reviews.title: Great product but small changes would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These work great so far. The batteries that come with it are cheap though, so just go ahead and replace them and order with new ones. 1 remote and 1 unit's batteries died in the first 2 weeks. I've synced up 3 units on two different remotes so we can easily activate and de-activate them. My only complain in the design is the fact that they are so loud when they are activated and de-activated. We usually set them when we put the kids to bed and the beeps to tell you are just as loud as the alarms. It would be nice if those were half-volume so I don't wake up everyone when we disarm!
customer_reviews.author: C Maitland

customer_reviews.title: Received a used item.
customer_reviews.text: Item is obviously USED. Double sided tape was already attached and one piece of tape had its protective paper removed. Probably a return that was resold.
customer_reviews.author: TonyC

customer_reviews.title: Loud.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a door alarm for my 10-year-old who sneaks around in the middle of the night. After I caught him trying to cook, I became concerned about our safety while sleeping. This is easy, and effective. The remote is lovely so I can arm and disarm it without actually getting up. But the alarm is SUPER LOUD. The "siren" option is deafening, and the basic alarm is the same sound and volume you hear when you enter a convenience store. It's effective, but I wish we could control the volume a bit. But, at least we're safe!
customer_reviews.author: chey kierbs

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases on this site
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop thinking about it lol it was easy to setup, all the sensors synced easily, and it'll keep the meth heads away. I had the idea of one of these, and BAM; Amazon had one. If you don't want to pay for a service like ADP, I highly recommend this thing. I'm cheap white trash and this thing is perfect for me. I absolutely love it. I have the fob and three sensors, and I'm about to buy two more sensors JUST to make it louder. Highly highly highly recommend. It could be louder, but still great.
customer_reviews.author: YggdrasilYggy

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: The alarm scared the @#$% out of me when i had it set up the first night: I woke up early AM and forgot to disarm it as I took my dog outside and it sure makes you jump fast when you least expect it - this alarm does what it's supposed to do and I love it. I do wish I had more options with volume to sound to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Loud piercing alarm. Easy to use. Seems like a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic housing and battery compartment isn't particularly beefy, and it would certainly be easy to disarm it quickly if you knew where to look. BUT, for the purpose of securing a storage unit from an opportunistic night-time break-in, I think this would be a successful deterrent. The alarm is loud enough to make my ears ring after only a few seconds of exposure. I like the fact that it uses a remote for locking and unlocking the alarm. This makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed on my back door, I love the lock and unlock remote, I have recommended this item to my family members that live alone
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. I have put this is in my office door and so far it is working perfectly. The remote control is amazing! I turn it off when I arrived my office and turn it on when I leaved. I tested it many times and I think this is a brilliant idea! There is only one thing, I wish they include a small screw because my door is not big enough to put the other small part of the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: fam_adventure

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we put batteries in it the thing would not make any sounds and the batteries got so hot you could hardly touch them. I took at back down and tossed it into the trash. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jlove

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to use. I was a little worried about the adhesive tape that's on the back that secures it but it seems to be VERY secure and I'm surprised by that. Would hate for it to come off and the alarm go off when I'm not home, but for now it's really secure. Tested the noise level and this was also surprising. It's REALLY loud. I had to turn it off immediately because of how loud it was. I wanted an alarm because I don't like living in an apartment that doesn't have a security system, so while this doesn't call a security company when tripped, the noise itself is going to be a big deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: A Small lil Beast
customer_reviews.text: Omg this item is off the chain!! 2 triple A batteries needed, and mounding is to perfection. Adhesive is so strong upon mounding pulled paint off my door way wood. So be sure you want it to stay where u mound it, exactly! It's so loud, you cannot miss the sound!! I love it and it can be armed & activated from far away. I stood in my closet about 450-500 ft away and armed it with my some way on other side of my apartment home. This item beats ADT, security cam, etc. Your neighbors cannot deny the loud noise this baby projects!! Perfectly designed and engineered Very easy to use! Updates to come! Tyty
customer_reviews.author: crystalh

customer_reviews.title: Arm and Disarming beeping is really loud.
customer_reviews.text: Arming and Disarming beeping is really loud, not quite as loud as the actual alarm being tripped, but loud enough to cause a complaint with my neighbors. That makes this thing pretty much useless to me unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device!
customer_reviews.text: This wireless alarm is so easy to install with the sticky pads included. Add two AAA batteries to the host and you're good to go. The remote control battery is already in the remote. Settings are self-explanatory but there is a small sheet of instructions. I have the remote about 20 feet from the alarm and it works perfectly. The panic alarm is loud enough to wake the dead and send the cat fleeing to under the bed. I installed the alarm on my patio door and now I'm not concerned about nighttime burglars. For $9 it's a deal and will give you peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: grandma-g

customer_reviews.title: Houston. We have a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Description says {low consumption} but i bought it the 5th of April and its now May 24th and its not working as intended. When set to alarm and the door is opened it just beeps once and then lt lets out a quick chirp with a red light flash but no alarm. So either the batteries are dead or the product is faulty. Huge let down, and refund period is over.... Can't protect grandmas stuff if the alarm doesnt work as intended, can't be bothered to replace 2 triple A[AAA] batteries every month or so. Spend money elsewhere for an alarm?..
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Loud but our battery is changed often
customer_reviews.text: It is loud and easy to install however I do not know if it's the batteries we use or the item but we have had to change the batteries 3- maybe 4 times already since we had it. About 9 months. It could be our batteries or the item itself. That is the downfall for us. I plan on buying really good expensive batteries to see if they last more than 4 months. Fingers crossed. If not it is the item. We have this on our sliding patio door. Both sides on the inside, touching each other but enough to slide against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Megs Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Bought it cause my autistic son get wanting to take midnight strolls through the neighborhood. I love the flashing light that lets me know it's on have had it a month now and still havent changed the batteries. Simple installment and easy remote instructions. One con I dont care for is if you open the door while its activated the alarm does NOT go off until you push the button on the remote so even if you re shut the door it doesnt deactivate the alarm. The alarm is load and alerting! Its definitely starving its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: crystal vickers

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Easy to install and still works on our titled door frame. I got this item because I have a busy toddler and don't want him wandering out the door. It is loud enough to draw attention and was worth the price. I would recommend this item as long as you can keep track of your remote control since this item has no buttons on the alarm itself. I love the doorbell mode as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brown

customer_reviews.title: Limits teen access
customer_reviews.text: You can stick this alarm on any flat surface. We live with a trouble foster teen that needs constant supervision. I use them on any cabinet, door or window that we want to limit access. I highly recommend these as a safe guard. While she can still open the door, we know and can respond immediately. Even if we have stepped out of the house for a minute, she can't shut the alarm off, so we know what she's done. They are a lifesaver for us. The alarm is VERY loud so be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: enchntrus1

customer_reviews.title: I Am Buying More
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the door of my barn. It is reliable (I have accidentally set it off several times now, ) loud enough, and the remote works from my deck- about 65-70 feet away! So, if I forget to turn it on or off when I am at the barn, I can do it from my back deck. It is loud enough to make any thief think twice. My neighbor almost half an acre away can hear it! What made me choose this product though, was the remote. I can set the alarm from OUTSIDE the barn. So, lock it up, set the alarm with the remote, and leave.
customer_reviews.author: Joy B.

customer_reviews.title: Door alarm.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm works for me. You need to know where the remote is if you set it off by accident or you will need to pull the batteries out. There is no off button. It is loud enough to wake everyone up or to scare and intruder. I like mine I just keep my remote on my key ring. And you can set it from outside the door. But make sure you push the disarm button before you go in or the alarm will be loud.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect !
customer_reviews.text: We have a handicap child. And having this alarm on the front and back doors is great !Gives us a piece of mind !!!! We had to have something that was really loud. And this just works so great to have a remote to arm it .Makes you sleep easier at night. I highly recommend this product especially for Autism parents. Oh and the price was really a deal to.
customer_reviews.author: L.Britt

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks tape is holding fine to both wood and metal doors
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks tape is holding fine to both wood and metal doors. I used mounting putty to place the remote control next to the door (out of little hands reach) and this works exactly as we need it to. Even on chime it is very loud. Minor complaint: The large remote button should turn the damn thing off but it doesn't (it's a panic button). To turn it off is the unlock, top little button which is not very convenient when you're standing next to the damn thing and it goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one was defective but was sent another immediately, great service response. The 2nd delivered one works great, easy to install and the remote worked instantly. I think the noise level of the alarm is perfect especially when you are in another level of the house. I ordered another one which was lost in shipping but it would not have worked because the door frame has to be almost level with the door in order to pair and my office door frame extends too far out.
customer_reviews.author: PGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Works and is so loud!
customer_reviews.text: I have a teenager who likes to sneak out and so for piece of mind I wanted alarms to put on door/windows but at a price I could afford. After checking out multiple options and reading the reviews for this item especially after seeing other parents using these for their kids I wanted to give them a shot and let me tell you these work! Make sure you have the two pieces aligned after you've put in the batteries but before you touch the clicker otherwise you will be covering your ears. There is a "doorbell" setting instead of the alarm and its is loud enough on its own. I ordered 4 and they all work great.
customer_reviews.author: HPC

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it less than a month and already isn’t working right. I bought two! One for my front door and one for my back door. The one on my front door was working right for a little bit now it’s not. It only beeps once when the door is opened and I have it set so that the screaming alarm will go off. I’ve had them less than a month. We tried to change the alarm sounds and it just won’t do anything but beep once. I guess it’s what I get for buying cheap door alarms
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I love this little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good experiment, I have young ones that love to take midnight trips into the pantry and snack draws when their not suppose to. Having this installed provided the option remotely arming this locations scaring the snot of them especially the first time. Only wish I recorded it. it's very early to be leaving a review, it's been less than a week however; I'll keep you posted on any changes. So far. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Scurrys

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, no problems at all
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of dirt cheap home security solution for all your major entrances and doors!! This costs easily twice the money, I have one for front and back door programmed with 3 different remotes to control all the sensors. You can't find a better cheap system than this - and it is darn loud!! The remote to sensor distance is impressive to, I have had it reach over 30 feet.
customer_reviews.author: EnglandAPO

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my alarm when I moved into my apartment August 1st. My apartment has stairs once you open the front door with everything upstairs (no balcony so I only got 1) and a big concern of mine is if someone got in I wouldn’t know until they were right in my living room. This alarm is LOUD, like ear piercing. I can’t even use the “door open alarm” because it’s too loud. I can also active/deactivate from inside my room with the door closed so the range is good. I would definitely recommend purchasing one, it’s super easy to install as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you live alone get this.
customer_reviews.text: Hi this alarm is so loud I installed it in less than three minutes I actually have two alarms and I programmed my one remote control to work for both alarms it is super loud and it gives me the sense of security that I need please purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Black

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap... but they work as advertised. Yes you can link them together to work on several remotes simultaneously. The alarms will still go into alarm mode if triggered separately however arming, disarming and doorbell mode can be set or locked and unlocked in a single button press. Everything was as advertised but the instructions are written in bad English and can be slightly hard to interpret but it only took me a few minutes to sort out how to program additional remotes. Overall great product for very little cost. Just needed a little noise to go off if someone entered my garage at night so this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nehm

customer_reviews.title: LOUD, LOUD, LOUD - NOT for an Apartment
customer_reviews.text: Although I did read the reviews, and I read that this alarm was LOUD, I did not fully comprehend how loud it was until we tested it. Although its exactly what you may need should an unwanted guest try to make themselves comfortable in your home; just know, ITS LOUD. We also tried the 'doorbell ding' feature because we have a 1 and 3 year old; and sometimes they like to adventure out and see how far they can get to opening the door - but even the doorbell ding was obnoxiously loud; I didn't feel comfortable having our neighbors listen to the loud DING. We ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: D.Rocc916

customer_reviews.title: Not used as intended, Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this as its intended purpose, I used it as part of a birthday gag gift. The remote that comes with it works great. Put it near someone without them knowing and turn it on remotely and watch them jump. Have not doubt that it functions well as an alarm, I tested it along with the contact it came with, the alarm activated immediately when removed from contact. I did not give the installation any stars only because I did not install it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the noise level ratings, this is not nearly as loud as a fire alarm
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the noise level ratings, this is not nearly as loud as a fire alarm. This is a little bit louder than my cell phone. Batteries used are brand new, still not that loud. Sounds more like a halloween toy. I don't know if this would actually scare a criminal. When my roommate and i heard this we were disappointed, both agree. It won't reach the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Battery life is crap and had to replace in less than two months. If you open the door the alarm sounds. If you close it the alarm turns off and if you reopen the door it does not sound again. Nearly useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Alarm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this door bell for my daughters apartment. She loves it. The doorbell is loud and chimes everytime the door is open and if you set it for alarm, it will go off when set and you have to actually cut it off with the remote. Control. I love this small but sense of security. It was easy to install my daughter did it her self. It is a must for single Ladies with their own apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a very loud door alarm. You will definitely hear it even in a deep sleep. I like the remote to turn it on and off. It was easy to install and operate. It has a setting for entrance alerts and also alarm. That way I know when anyone is going in or out of my house when a door bell sound rings. The alarm is crazy loud. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, broken remote?
customer_reviews.text: The product works exactly as advertised. We love it. When turning on, the devices do beep loudly. But it isn't for long. It let's you know they are armed. Same with turning them off. My issue is that we've had these for about two months, and the remote quit working. We came home the other night and had to just deal with the alarms going off. I'm going to switch batteries, and if the remote doesn't work, I'll complain to customer service and update this review accordingly. We use the remote with 3 extra alarms and it was easy to pair them all. Other than the remote quitting, it has worked exactly like we thought it
customer_reviews.author: Ron Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install - double sided tape. Tape one piece to the door and the other to the frame. The tape position as well as orientation markings are clear on both sides. I can hear it from the other end of the house. I have it set for the doorbell chime. However, I tested the alarm and was happy to learn it does NOT automatically reset just because the door is closed. CONS: The images on the fob aren't necessarily intuitive. If I used it a lot, it would probably figure it out. The directions were obviously written by a non-native speaker, but are clear enough.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gatchel

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, but one remote makes it tough
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price and is extremely LOUD! It will wake you up for sure and is very easy to install. Be mindful that you can only use one remote with it, our old alarm we could have controlled it from the alarm itself but this one does not have it. Hard to use in a household of more than one person since there is only one remote.
customer_reviews.author: brody

customer_reviews.title: Two years later, stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It’s been almost two years and it just stopped working. Meaning I’ll arm it and if you open the door it’ll sound the unlock tone for some reason and disarm. But, for how cheap this was I’m happy with how long it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: loud alarm
customer_reviews.text: very loud alarm, and has ding dong setting also loud i use it with Alzheimer mom so she doesn't get out at night rather than key lock. would work great for door to pool and remote keeps unwanted from turning it off. battery last about 3 months in door with about 8 activation only 1 by mom the rest i forgot to shut off
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It is certainly loud.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for a teacher colleague for her classroom door due to a student that like to escape the room. It functioned as described and I can say that it is quite loud because I could hear it in my room two doors down the hallway with my door closed. She was pleased with it and it worked well for what she needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mann

customer_reviews.title: So far it works great! It does its work
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great! It does its job. I goes off when the door opens and alarms very loud! That s all I need. Super easy to connect one part to the wall and another one to the door. Super loud and that exactly what I need if emergency situation happens. Currently planning how to secure my place, so will be purchasing extra alarms to connect to my remote. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best theft detterent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and works as stated. Very loud siren. I wish it lasted a little longer, but overall I am very pleased with purchase. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Gorski

customer_reviews.title: One  layer of protection for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with simple instructions. I purchased four units about a month ago and cannot comment on the battery life just yet, but so far they have served their purpose well. The alarm sounds like a siren when it goes off and will probably make intruders think twice; it may also serve to alert next door apartment neighbor to call the police.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: With frequent break-ins in my neighborhood, I decided I needed to buy some sort of an alarm system. Although it wont alert the authorities, it should still deter anyone who dares to open my door. This is my savior! I truly did not believe that it was that loud, but it really is. It scared the wits out of me when I was trying to pair another alarm to the remote. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to go on our sliding door leading out to the patio. We have a lake behind the house and terrifies me to think of one of the young kids going out and making their way to the water. This product was simple to install, set, and has been to use. I'm very happy with the product and would recommend for anyone looking for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm
customer_reviews.text: Compact and easy install. It took less than ten minutes to sync the key fob and install. The door chime is very loud and you can hear it throughout the house. I don’t use the chime much, but like knowing house is secured when I leave. When it’s armed at night the red light will blink so you won’t forget and open the door without disarming. I also like that I don’t have to remember a numeric code. Plan on buying one for my sister .
customer_reviews.author: Rahrah64

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost alarm device!
customer_reviews.text: This device is great! Easy to install and setup. Pairing the alarm unit to multiple fobs was very simple and straight forward, so I'm not sure why some other users found that part to be troublesome. Maybe the company updated (as of 11/20/18) the directions on this, because it was super simple instructions and easy to do. I plan to purchase a few more units for my home.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We got this alarm for the door to the basement while we were having the basement finished. It worked perfectly. I did end up stacking some tape so the alarm and the contact were even. The remote worked great and everything worked as expected. Great price for this peace of mind too. I don’t think that the arming of the alarm is too loud but that’s subjective. It was only slightly louder than the honeywelll system that we have for the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I installed mine in our shed in case someone wanted to break in and walk away with my lawn equipment. It's an affordable and easy to install deterrent. Setting it isn't close to as loud as the alarm which is great, and there is no doubt my neighbors will hear the alarm should someone try to break in. Please with this great little purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Loud and effective but a pain
customer_reviews.text: So it took me a while to figure out that you have to put the sensor super close for it to work. The adhesive will tear off your paint.
customer_reviews.author: Ranita P

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My door has a pretty big gap so when I installed it the right way, it thought the door was open so it was alarming. It’s VERY loud. Even the one beep is too loud and my neighbors can hear so I had to muffle it a bit. Anyways, I had to turn it upside down and have them on opposite side they’re supposed to be so it works and so the magnet doesn’t think the door is open. So far works great. However, it didn’t come with batteries for me
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda McGee

customer_reviews.title: Comes with cheap Sunbeam AAAbattery and 27a Battery
customer_reviews.text: Comes with cheap Sunbeam aaa batteryand 27a battery. If you buy this you should replace the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: It’s loud & comes w/ a remote u can set it when ur leaving .. .. The remote reaches pretty far !! !!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but we were going on vacation & needed something at least to scare someone off if someone tried to break in & we installed it & it was super easy to install & came w/ a remote that reached pretty far. It was loud enough that if someone tried to break in while we were gone they most likely would run off & if not our neighbors would hear it and sure someone would call the police .. .. We are very satisfied w/ the price & what it does
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: Unable to remove screws from remote to add battery
customer_reviews.text: I'm unable to try this item. The tiny screws in the remote are so tight I cannot get them out, and now i have stripped the heads.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Learman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but Works Great
customer_reviews.text: OK, it's not a $1000 home security system, but it's easy to install and works great. I bought four. The instructions about getting all of the remotes synced up are badly translated but in practice it's very easy to do (see other comments for details). The alarms are smart and figure out what code they should respond to (no DIP switches to set). Two AA batteries not included.
customer_reviews.author: NWJ

customer_reviews.title: Loud but efficient
customer_reviews.text: LOUD.. that’s all I can say.. lol I installed this to make aware when anyone was coming in and out my back door it is loud boy and I swear the kids opened the door jus to turn the alarm on.. it’s a great buy if u want loud and being made aware who comes and goes
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very loud if the alarm is armed and goes off. However the battery life sucks. Only lasts about 6 months and majority of those 6 months it wasn’t even being used. I only use it when my husband is working out of town to give an added sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, especially since I can have it set as just a doorbell type with the remote or I can change it at night to turn on the alarm. The only thing that I wish it had was a sound volume to change this sounds a little bit since it is very, very loud. Which I guess for the alarm it is good. But I can’t even say it enough how loud it is. But I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for two reasons: (1) so I would stop wondering in the middle of the night if the sound I heard was someone breaking in my front door, and (2) so I would know that my toddler isn't sneaking out. I sleep much better at night without constantly worrying what every little sound is, especially since we have a cat. And my toddler even waits until I confirm that the alarm is off before we open the door because he hates the loud sound. It was easy to install, and it's been up for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Not made for all jamb types.....I placed it on my door anyway but it seems like the other piece is hanging by a thread even though there's a sticky tape holding it in place. I had to put cardboard underneath the main piece so it could be level with the other piece...other than that I really like it. Wanted to love it though.
customer_reviews.author: TrueSelf Kaye

customer_reviews.title: NO MONTHLY FEE / EASY QUICK NO ASSEMBLY !!!! Very good product !!!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT !!!! I hate ADT they overcharged me thousands ruined my credit I had to find another way ! thank god for this product and some wireless cameras I was able to establish my own protection services ! Easy to install for moms too !!!!! Thank you thank you thank you !!!! Love this product you really considered the consumer with this one !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa James

customer_reviews.title: This alarm is very loud
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is very loud!!!!!! Once I forget to turn it off before I went out, I open the door, it alarms very loudly! Almost frigten me. So I think it can scare thoes un-welcome guys. For the battery life, I currently do not know. Hopefully it can last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Yuelong

customer_reviews.title: Not for apartments.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GET IF YOU LIVE IN AN APARTMENT! I still gave it five stars because I will buy again when I move into a house. I did return it because there is no way I will be able to use it. It is easy to install, the remote is magical. However, when I armed it I couldn’t turn it off fast enough! There is no way I would be able to arm it with neighbors! If it only made that sound when someone was breaking in and just a double light beep when activated I would keep it .
customer_reviews.author: Charlee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if could see what mode it's in, lower door chime volume, change settings at unit
customer_reviews.text: Would be perfect if could tell what mode it is in visually, lower the door chime volume, and change settings at the unit, instead of with the remote. Great overall and would buy again if needed. Remote worked fine about 40 ft away unobstructed view, didn't test farther.
customer_reviews.author: mrtechbench

customer_reviews.title: Pretty loud...
customer_reviews.text: Although these are loud by themselves, I put 3 on my yard shed door for more ear splitting power !! The ease of use is a plus as the remote makes it easy to turn on and off ......That alone is a plus I like ! For the $$ spent, these are an easy alternative to expensive hard wired systems, as you can set them up anywhere !!
customer_reviews.author: vb

customer_reviews.title: Yep. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve really liked having this product, I don’t love how it beeps EVERY time it arms and disarms. I have a feeling when our baby comes it will wake them up. But a little peace of mind for a little bit of money sure doesn’t hurt
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Flawless
customer_reviews.text: At a bargain price, this little alarm gives excellent service. I needed to provide an alarm for one door that is not a part of my whole-house system. It also had to be LOUD enough to reach my ears in another part of the house. This alarm is perfect. In months of use, it has never given a false alarm, has a piercing very loud alarm, and -- so far -- no battery depletion.
customer_reviews.author: Riverwalker

customer_reviews.title: Added Home Security at Very Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value product! For an affordable cost you enable security in your home. The noise is relatively loud! Yes, it is NOT as loud as car alarm, but loud enough to scare off intruders. Remote comes in decent size, it is NOT small at all. In addition, pairing extra remote is so easy. Go and Watch the video!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grand9

customer_reviews.title: petfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: So far they have worked well. I’ve set them off accidently myself byforgetting and opening up my door! They were super simple to install. I’ve had no issues with them. They are quite loud and would definitely deter someone trying to break in
customer_reviews.author: C. Mossing

customer_reviews.title: Just Don't!!!
customer_reviews.text: No where loud enough and a single beep is not an ALARM. Followed the instructions also looked up on line to be sure I was doing everything correctly. Either this was a bad unit or it's a crappy product. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Spyder71

customer_reviews.title: Is not the best for french doors
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why, but these and my French front doors do not agree. It sets off randomly. Which is it because the other door moved? I don't know. I took it down within a day because it was just constantly going off.
customer_reviews.author: Cecillia J

customer_reviews.title: I put it under my RV
customer_reviews.text: If I need to sound an alarm from the back of my RV, this works great. It's very loud, and easy to trigger with the remote. Rechargeable batteries seems to last 6 months or so. Cold or hot weather has not bothered it so far this year.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: very loud
customer_reviews.text: easy to place...read where some said they fell off within a few days so I intend to put a little glue on them to make more permanent....purchased 2 and plan on purchasing more.......live alone and some type of deterrent is better than nothing
customer_reviews.author: SOPHIE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! The magnet design is really smart - it ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The magnet design is really smart - it goes off the moment the door opens, and it is LOUD! Only caveat is you can only turn it off with a remote, so you will want to keep that thing somewhere where it won't get lost! :-0 Such an easy and inexpensive way to add a significant sense of security in your home.
customer_reviews.author: John & Michelle King

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud
customer_reviews.text: The alarm works as advertised and yes if someone was breaking in you would want a loud alarm but simply to turn it on, off, or change setting it lets off an ear piercing beep(s). It's really not necessary & if you live in apartments its not practical because it is so loud that everyone in your building will hear it. I was unable to use it due to this, otherwise i loved the remote feature & as stated in the event of a break in then yes the level of noise would be awesome just not something i need to hear every time its turned on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we imagined
customer_reviews.text: We got this to scare our 4 year old out of walking out the front door. We have a real alarm installed in our house, it's just not active. The fires already break when you open them, unfortunately weer can't hear that from our master bedroom. I was concerned we couldn't be angle to hear this either. I think it worked pretty well though. Easily installed. However it's a little cumbersome remembering to turn it in and off, but that had nothing to do with the product and everything to do with my laziness and memory.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it for when my 3yr old tries to sneak out of the house in the middle of the night ... Scares the crap out of him and he wont touch that door if I set the alarm. The doorbell mode is nice for when I'm showering, sleeping etc. That way I can hear my husband go in and out with out having to get up and turn off the alarm. Its a subtle doorbell ding. Very loud I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality for the low price. Does what its supposed to reliably. Ditch the included instructions, and follow the instructions that one of the reviews laid out, and its easy and quick to setup. The signal to alarm, arm and disarm, does indeed travel at least 30 feet through wooden doors, so gotta be RF signal.
customer_reviews.author: John Czyz

customer_reviews.title: Good for peace of mind, while you are there.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Used one remote to activate and deactivate both. Sound was ok. Battery lasts about a month with no alarms. If alarm goes of you can easily turn around and pull batteries. No screw in cover to prevent easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Able to control with voice. Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, very loud for his size, no programming necessary, great range, a perfect solution too keep people out of your man's cave, I just copy the remote to my wifi remote hub and I am able to arm and disarm using voice commands on my Google home and Alexa..just great
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This little alarm for 13.00 gives such piece of mind.You have a remote that sets the alarm, when set ,a little red light flashes showing you it is armed.The remote also has a panic button which I just love! The alarm is loud. Loud enough to bring attention. Bought several , very Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Would not stop sounding the alarm. I kept pushing the off button and it would not turn off. Finally was able to take the batteries out to make it stop. The instructions were not translated well either.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an outside studio office as a deterrent. It is simple to install and easy to arm/disarm. The noise level is about all you could expect that could be produced by such a small speaker. It is pretty loud, and would probably scare the crap out of someone in the middle of the night. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Bazeghi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This has a very loud sound, so when the door opens, I can hear it in the room next door. We have a store with 2 rooms, but only me, so I needed a method of security, to keep the door locked. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Besisto

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great deterrent for a burglar...
customer_reviews.text: Great protection gadget. I also bought an additional remote for another home member. Works great. And it will be a great deterrent against a potential burglar- that noise really startles you and makes you want to run! Very happy with it, I completely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper is not always better
customer_reviews.text: It just straight out does not work I put the right batteries in it and it does absolutely nothing but but then again it wasn't that expensive so so I kind of figured it wouldn't anyway
customer_reviews.author: Kerrybaby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget
customer_reviews.text: THE best purchase I have made in a while. i have a son that has autism and he has eloped the home several times this let's me know every time he leaves his room. its amazing. so easy to install and is still on the same battery! highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Andino

customer_reviews.title: failed within 2 wks
customer_reviews.text: works great initially but the remote no longer works after 2 wks. unit not able to disarm with remote. had to remove battery to turn off the alarm and now i can't arm it......
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It was cool for the two months that it lasted. Hence the two stars. After that, even after changing the battery, it no longer works. Also, I expected it to be much louder based on other reviews and a video someone else posted... maybe I just got a defective one?
customer_reviews.author: Elle

product_meta.title: Wsdcam Door Alarm Wireless Anti-Theft Remote Control Door and Window Security Alarms
feature_bullets: Arm/Disarm/Panic/Doorbell mode controlled by the remote
Magnetically triggered alarm suitable for Doors or Windows
More alarms and remotes available for pairing
Detering thieves effectively by 105dB loud alarm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,428 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
